name: HEROES AREN'T HARD TO FIND GIFT CERTIFICATE
description:
The gift that everyone really wants!

Available in sizes to suit every budget!

Gift Certificate is only good on merchandise at our brick and mortar store.

Free 1st class USPS shipping.

Expedited shipping available for $5
(We'll throw some extra goodies in the box too depending on what we have on hand!)

North Carolina residents pay 7.25% sales tax

name: HARLEY QUINN #0 BLANK VARIANT + REGULAR :: ART EXHIBITION ENTRY
description:
Purchase a regular and sketch variant Harley Quinn #0 for $10
($5 will be given to the Red Cross Typhoon Haiyan relief fund)

Draw your own cover featuring Harley Quinn ( Classic, Arkham, New 52, an original
design, it’s up to you!) on the blank cover and get it back to Heroes Aren’t Hard To Find
by December 31st to be entered in the exhibition.

Best entries will be selected and displayed at the Charlotte MiniCon on January 25th. 

By submitting to the exhibition you will earn free admission to the Charlotte MiniCon.
You don’t need to be present to win but we hope you will be!

All entries can be claimed at Charlotte MiniCon or if you choose, your entry will be
auctioned off with all proceeds going to benefit Red Cross Typhoon Haiyan relief.
No entries will be returned by mail unless arranged in advance. $6 prepaid Priority Mail

Awards include HeroesCon 3 day passes, Heroes T-shirts, Gift Certificates and more!

We only have enough blank variants to accept 50 entries, get yours today!

Fine Print:
• This is an amateur art exhibition and is closed to professional artists
• Charlotte MiniCon is a family friendly show so please keep your artwork all-ages
• Harley Quinn is copyright DC Comics who has no affiliation with this exhibition

name: HEROESCON 2013 T-SHIRT :: ROCKETEER BY LEE WEEKS :: NAVY

Illustrated by Lee Weeks

Unisex S-XXXXL
Ladies S-XL
Ladies v-neck S-XL
Youth S-L

No international orders please.

name: Batman Black and White :: Man-Bat by Neal and Spyda Adams :: DC Direct
description:
•Artist Neal Adams, the statue's designer, is revered for his artistic interpretations of Batman and his adventures
•Sculpted by Jason "Spyda" Adams
•Captures the menacing spirit of DC Comics' classic Detective Comics #400 cover
•Measures approximately 5.5" H x 7.25" W x 4.75" D
•Bat-logo base

Once you place your order we'll calculate shipping. We will ship this item to you as economically as possible. Combine items to save on shipping costs!

name: Batman Black and White :: Patrick Gleason :: DC Direct
description:
Designed by Patrick Gleason. Sculpted by Phil Ramirez. Classic Dark Knight. This latest statue in the popular Batman Black and White statue series was designed by Patrick Gleason with a look inspired by his current work on Batman and Robin. Cold-cast in porcelain, the statue measures approximately 7.75? high x 5? wide x 3.25? deep, is painted in monochromatic tones, features a Bat-logo-shaped base and is packaged in a black and white box. Limited Edition.

Features include: 

•Designed By Patrick Gleason
•Sculpted By Phil Ramirez
•Based on Gleason's art from the hit DC Comics title Batman and Robin
•Cold-cast porcelain
•Measures approximately 7.75" x 5" x 3.25"

Once you place your order we'll calculate shipping. We will ship this item to you as economically as possible. Combine items to save on shipping costs!

name: Batman Black and White :: Darwyn Cooke :: DC Direct
description:
DESIGNED BY DARWYN COOKE

SCULPTED BY JON MATTHEWS

Renowned artist Darwyn Cooke gives a modern twist to the Dark Knight's Golden Age style with latest from the 'Batman: Black and White' line of collectibles. Standing ready to defend the night, this statue, painted in monochromatic tones, adds a classic feel to any shelf! 

Figure measures 5.5" high x 6" wide x 5" deep.

Once you place your order we'll calculate shipping. We will ship this item to you as economically as possible. Combine items to save on shipping costs!

name: Batman Black and White :: Dustin Nguyen :: DC Direct
description:

Sculpted by Joseph Menna.

This  Batman Black and White statue is an original design for DC Direct. This statue measures approximately 7.61" high x 5.1" wide x 3.45" deep, is painted in monochromatic tones, features a Bat-logo-shaped base, and is packaged in a black-and-white box. 

Limited edition.

Once you place your order we'll calculate shipping. We will ship this item to you as economically as possible. Combine items to save on shipping costs!

Each of the 2 books is signed by Matt Wagner on the cover.

Includes die cut, foil-stamped and embossed Certificate of Authenticity signed by Shelton Drum.

name: RIP SNORTINEST DUDE EVER by John Hairston Jr.
description:
From the  1962: The Age Of Marvels gallery show at Heroes Aren't Hard to Find comes this great piece by artist John Hairston Jr.

These paintings will hang in our store through the Democratic National Convention so this is your last chance to own one of there masterpieces!

Artwork is 48"x72" on stretched canvas

Local Pick-Up encouraged. 

Will ship, buyer pays shipping and cost of packing materials.

description:

Available unsigned and signed by Shelton Drum and Linda d'Olivat

ASTONISHING X-MEN #51 CREATE YOUR OWN WEDDING VARIANT 
Written by MARJORIE LIU
Art by MIKE PERKINS
Cover by PHIL NOTO

NM or better

Will ship up to 6 books for same flat fee of $6 shipping.

name: Adventure Time #5 HeroesCon Variant by Dave Cooper
description:
Ultra-rare HeroesCon 2012 variant of Adventure Time #5!

This striking image of Finn and Jake went viral when it was posted online a few weeks before HeroesCon 2012. Now you can own it! Adventure Time #5 also features a guest story by Paul Pope!

Cover art by Dave Cooper

Only 500 on the planet!

NM or better

Will ship up to 6 books for same flat fee of $6 shipping.

No international orders.

name: AVENGERS ASSEMBLE #1 HEROES VARIANT
description:
Ultra-rare HeroesCon 2012 variant of Avengers Assemble #1! 

Cover art by Khoi Pham

NM or better

Will ship up to 6 books for same flat fee of $6 shipping.

All orders will ship Wednesday, March 14th when this book hits stands!

Issue synopsis: The Avengers Versus The *Brand-New* Zodiac! • One Of The Greatest Avengers Villains Of All Time Gets Reinvented For The Modern Age Just In Time For The Blockbuster Movie Event Of The Summer! • A Perfect Jumping-On Point Featuring The Cast Of The Summer Blockbuster But In Marvel Universe Continuity!

Neal Adams Green Lantern/ Green Arrow Poster 

Will ship up to 6 more books for same flat shipping rate.
Combine and save!

name: AVENGERS X-SANCTION #1 | Heroes Convention 2012 Variant
description:
Heroes Aren't Hard exclusive HeroesCon 2012 variant cover of this book that kicks off 2012's Avengers VS X-Men Crossover!

This book is extremely limited!

Will ship up to 6 books for same flat fee of $6 shipping.

AVENGERS X-SANCTION #1 (of 4)  MARVEL COMICS
(W) Jeph Loeb (A/CA) Ed McGuinness

CABLE IS BACK! AND HE'S GOT JUST 24 HOURS TO WIPE THE AVENGERS FROM THE PAGES OF HISTORY!

How has Cable been reborn? Where has he been since "Second Coming"? And what dark event has driven him to destroy the Avengers? The answers are just the tip of an iceberg that threatens to smash the Marvel Universe to smithereens! 
A crucial new series by the creators behind SUPERMAN/BATMAN and HULK, Jeph Loeb and Ed McGuinness

THE COUNTDOWN TO 2012's STATUS QUO-SHATTERING EPIC BEGINS HERE!

32 PGS./Rating T+

Shipping: Flat $5.00, No international shipping.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles #3 VA Comicon Variant
description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles #3 Virgin and Pencil Art VA Comicon Variant! Only available at the VA Comicon!

Christmas Themed!

Front cover is full color cover art by Brian Shearer, Rick Ketcham, and Rachelle Rosenberg, no logos just art!

Back cover is Brian Shearer's beautiful pencil art with logos.

NM or better

Will ship up to 6 books for same flat fee of $6 shipping.

name: Loose Ends #1 "Neon Noir" 3-Pack
description:
Loose Ends is a 4 issue "Southern Crime Romance" created by Jason Latour, Chris Brunner and Rico Renzi.

The Loose Ends #1 "Neon Noir" 3-Pack includes 1 of each of the following:

•  Loose Ends #1 Signed by all 3 creators
•  Loose Ends #1 Signed, Limited Edition, Black & White "Virgin" Cover
• 11"x 17" Signed and Numbered, Limited Edition of 50, 2-Color Silk Screen Poster

Domestic Orders Only!

name: Loose Ends #1
description:
You've been looking all over for this hard to find breakout hit comic of 2010 and Heroes is the place to get it!

Will ship up to 6 books for same flat fee of $6 shipping. Check out other books in the store to save!

LOOSE ENDS #1

No one seemed to notice Sonny Gibson as he stepped back into 'The Hideaway'; a dusty little honky-tonk nestled off the Carolina highway. But before the night was over, Sonny would be on the run. From the law, from the criminals, even from himself. 

LOOSE ENDS is a gritty, slow cooked, "southern crime romance", that follows a winding trail down Tobacco Road, through the war torn streets of Baghdad, and into the bright lights and bloody gutters of South Florida...12-Gauge style.

name: Loose Ends #2
description:
You've been looking all over for this hard to find breakout hit comic of 2010 and Heroes is the place to get it!

Will ship up to 6 books for same flat fee of $6 shipping. Check out other books in the store to save!

LOOSE ENDS #2

In the wake of the worst night of their lives, Sonny and Cheri are 'wanted' and on the run. Vicious drug cartels and crooked cops lie in wait on the road before them, but tonight it's the past that looms largest in the rear view mirror-- a past filled with betrayal, conspiracy, promise rings and varsity jackets. Tonight, no matter how fast they drive, they can't escape the mistakes of their youth. 

LOOSE ENDS is a gritty, slow cooked, "southern crime romance", that follows a winding trail down Tobacco Road, through the war torn streets of Baghdad, and into the bright lights and bloody gutters of South Florida...12-Gauge style.

name: Loose Ends #3
description:
You've been looking all over for this hard to find breakout hit comic of 2010 and Heroes is the place to get it!

Will ship up to 6 books for same flat fee of $6 shipping. Check out other books in the store to save!

LOOSE ENDS #3

"Welcome to Miami, Sonny and Cheri. Here you'll find it all. Gorgeous people, beautiful weather and the decadent life you so richly deserve. Let the rhythm of the night drive the worry from your mind. Wash the blood from your hands in our crystal blue waters and party like there is no tomorrow. Because if the vicious drug cartels and crooked cops waiting in the alley have their way... there just might not be one." 

LOOSE ENDS is a gritty, slow cooked, "southern crime romance", that follows a winding trail down Tobacco Road, through the war torn streets of Baghdad, and into the bright lights and bloody gutters of South Florida...12-Gauge style.
